title: Front-end Web Development
description: Learn to build interactive and responsive websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Back-end Web Development
description: Master server-side programming with Node.js and express to build robust web applications.

title: Full-stack Web Development
description: Combine front-end and back-end technologies to create end-to-end web applications.

title: Data Science
description: Dive into data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling to solve complex problems.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Learn to design and develop mobile applications for Android and iOS using React Native.

title: Cybersecurity
description: Understand the fundamentals of cybersecurity, including network security, threat analysis, and ethical hacking.
